hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, NAV_DB_NAME, ORGANISATION_ID, SYNC_ID, SYNC_TYPE FROM NAV_VENDOR_SYNC WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO NAV_VENDOR_SYNC ( CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, NAV_DB_NAME, ORGANISATION_ID, SYNC_ID, SYNC_TYPE ) VALUES ( ${CREATION_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${NAV_DB_NAME}, ${ORGANISATION_ID}, ${SYNC_ID}, ${SYNC_TYPE} )

UPDATE NAV_VENDOR_SYNC SET CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, NAV_DB_NAME = ${NAV_DB_NAME}, ORGANISATION_ID = ${ORGANISATION_ID}, SYNC_ID = ${SYNC_ID}, SYNC_TYPE = ${SYNC_TYPE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
